channel.title: Interface
channel.description: Hey guys, I added a loyalty thing in my cache but idk how to make it pop up on the screen, like idk what code it is. How do I make a code for it or find a code for it?

item.title: Interface
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

b00mz1029:

Hey guys, I added a loyalty thing in my cache but idk how to make it pop up on the screen, like idk what code it is. How do I make a code for it or find a code for it?

I’m assuming you’re using PI. If so, try this:

c.getPA().showInterface(interfaceId);

Use that method inside of a command, an action when clicking an object/npc, etc.

Read full topic
